title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1105.1 - Licensing and certification examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1105.1 - Licensing and certification examinations

State Regulations

The AQB's real property appraiser licensing and certification
examinations may be provided by any test provider that is an Appraiser

Qualifications Board (AQB) approved examination administrator. Examinations
shall be administered at locations that are representative of the geographic
regions of New York State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1105.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
